name: HD Simple Game
description:
This project is a bare attempt at making a simple game structure and a succession of three levels where third-person controlled robots have to reach red flying dots.

While this prototype is not exempt of bugs, it can run smoothly a full walkthrough in normal conditions.

This is an example project you can access in order to figure out how to make a game using Gameplay Ingredients.

*Game Project* : https://github.com/peeweek/HDSimpleGame

*Gameplay Ingredients* : https://github.com/peeweek/net.peeweek.gameplay-ingredients
